summary.span: 沿著一組 繪製 屬性的值。

span.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要畫面格動畫的目標值由定義其屬性，其中包含的集合物件。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每個定義一段的動畫，與它自己的目標和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 當動畫執行時，它從進展一個索引鍵值在指定的下一個索引鍵時間。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.

span.span: KeyFrame Animation Sample

span.span: Adds a text string as a child of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不接受文字做為子系，所以此方法會引發`InvalididOperationException`除非在衍生的類別已覆寫此行為可加入文字。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

exception.span: 不接受文字做為子系，因此除非衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為，否則該方法會引發這個例外狀況。

span.span: A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

summary.span: 計算這個 的目前輸出值。

span.span: Calculates the current output value of this .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，在這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值; 否則這個值會與鏈結中的上一個動畫所傳回的值這不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫是位在第一個動畫撰寫層的屬性; 否則值會是輸出值，從上一個動畫撰寫層的屬性。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
